effect.en: As long as this Pokémon has Unit Energy FightingDarknessFairy attached to it, it is a Fighting, Darkness, and Fairy Pokémon.
effect.fr: Tant que de l’Énergie Unitaire FightingDarknessFairy est attachée à ce Pokémon, c’est un Pokémon Fighting, Darkness et Fairy.
effect.es: Mientras este Pokémon tenga alguna carta de Energía Unidad FightingDarknessFairy unida a él, es un Pokémon Fighting, Darkness y Fairy.
effect.it: Fintanto che ha delle carte Energia Unione FightingDarknessFairy assegnate, questo Pokémon è di tipo Fighting, Darkness e Fairy.
effect.pt: Enquanto este Pokémon tiver Energia Unitária FightingDarknessFairy ligada a ele, será um Pokémon Fighting, Darkness e Fairy.
effect.de: Solang an dieses Pokémon Aggregat-Energie FightingDarknessFairy angelegt ist, ist es ein Fighting-, Darkness- und Fairy-Pokémon.
